reviews.review: I loved this film it made me smile long after the final credits and that is a rare experience Dont miss this
I love this episode of Columbo
Well worth a two hour viewing. If everyone could laugh as much as I did during this movie the world would be a much happier place to live.
This is a good movie and i recommend it
you get the worth of the money what you have paid
If you wanna see some good entertainment you can rather take a twenty minute pause in front of the mirror Do some faces and move on Its more entertaining than this show
Try something that provides multiple points of view from qualified sources, not this one
it really is a bad film there are no funny elements no jokes that are funny i dont know how some people can claim this dismal short film could be smartest or quality
If you really want to waste minutes of your life then watch it for all the others dont do it because you WILL regret it
Impenetrable rubbish This has to be one of the worst movies I have ever seen
